Key Match Events: Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav shared a crucial 91-run stand.
Dasun Shanaka scored an unbeaten 56 runs.
Umran Malik took three wickets but conceded 48 runs.
Dasun Shanaka bowled a sensational final over to seal the game for Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka (206/6) beat India (190/8) by 16 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill and Yuzvendra Chahal were in focus after failing to create an impact in the first T20I.
Rahul Tripathi was expected to make his international debut as Sanju Samson was ruled out of the series due to a knee injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second T20I match was played at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Pune.
The match began at 7:00 pm IST.
The match was televised on Star Sports Network in India and streamed live on Disney+Hotstar.
